trans-unit.source: Represents a non-generic collection of objects that can be individually accessed by index.
trans-unit.target: 代表可依索引個別存取的非泛型物件集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IList> is a descendant of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface and is the base interface of all non-generic lists.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IList> 是的下階<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>介面，並且是所有非泛型清單的基底介面。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IList> implementations fall into three categories: read-only, fixed-size, and variable-size.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IList> 實作可分成三個類別： 唯讀、 固定的大小和大小。

trans-unit.source: A read-only <xref:System.Collections.IList> cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀<xref:System.Collections.IList>無法修改。

trans-unit.source: A fixed-size <xref:System.Collections.IList> does not allow the addition or removal of elements, but it allows the modification of existing elements.
trans-unit.target: 固定大小<xref:System.Collections.IList>不允許加入或移除項目，但允許修改現有的項目。

trans-unit.source: A variable-size <xref:System.Collections.IList> allows the addition, removal, and modification of elements.
trans-unit.target: 可變大小<xref:System.Collections.IList>允許加入、 移除及修改項目。

trans-unit.source: For the generic version of this interface, see <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面的泛型版本，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範實作<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面來建立簡單的清單、 固定大小清單。

trans-unit.source: The object to add to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 的物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds an item to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />.
trans-unit.target: 將項目加入至 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />。

trans-unit.source: The position into which the new element was inserted, or -1 to indicate that the item was not inserted into the collection.
trans-unit.target: 插入新項目的位置，或是 -1，表示此項目沒有插入集合中。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface to create a simple, fixed-size list.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範實作<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面來建立簡單的、 固定大小的清單。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼是針對較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 具有固定的大小。

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 中移除所有項目。

trans-unit.source: Implementations of this method can vary in how they handle the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.Count%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the capacity of a collection.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法會有所不同中如何處理<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.Count%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和集合的容量。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the count is set to zero, and references to other objects from elements of the collection are also released.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，計數設為零，而且也會釋放對其他物件的參考從集合中的項目。

trans-unit.source: The capacity can be set to zero or a default value, or it can remain unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 容量可以設定為零或預設值，或可以維持不變。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範實作<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面來建立簡單的清單、 固定大小清單。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼是針對較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 中尋找的物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> contains a specific value.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 是否包含特定值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is found in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 中找到 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods on `item` to determine whether item exists.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，這個方法會使用集合的物件<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>和<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法`item`來判斷項目是否存在。

trans-unit.source: In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，藉由進行這項判斷<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>和<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法`item`參數集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範實作<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面來建立簡單的清單、 固定大小清單。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼是針對較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 中尋找的物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of a specific item in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 中指定項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of <paramref name="value" /> if found in the list; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果可在清單中找到則為 <paramref name="value" /> 的索引，否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods on `item` to determine whether item exists.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，這個方法會使用集合的物件<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>和<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法`item`來判斷項目是否存在。

trans-unit.source: In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，藉由進行這項判斷<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>和<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法`item`參數集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範實作<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面來建立簡單的清單、 固定大小清單。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼是針對較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which <c>value</c> should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 應該插入 <c>value</c> 之以零啟始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The object to insert into the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />.
trans-unit.target: 要插入 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 的物件。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an item to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將項目插入位於指定索引的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />。

trans-unit.source: If `index` equals the number of items in the <xref:System.Collections.IList>, then `value` is appended to the end.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `index` 等於 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 中的項目數目，則會將 `value` 附加至結尾。

trans-unit.source: In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element.
trans-unit.target: 在連續項目的集合 (例如清單) 中，後面接著插入點的項目會向下移動以容納新項目。

trans-unit.source: If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合具有索引，則移動之項目的索引也會更新。

trans-unit.source: This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 集合的項目若在概念上群組成 Bucket (例如雜湊資料表)，則不適用這項行為。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範實作<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面來建立簡單的清單、 固定大小清單。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼是針對較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is not a valid index in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 中的有效索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 具有固定的大小。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is null reference in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 是 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 中的 null 參考。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 是否有固定的大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> has a fixed size; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 有固定大小，則為 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements.
trans-unit.target: 具有固定大小的集合不允許在集合建立後新增或移除項目，但允許對現有項目進行修改。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範實作<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面來建立簡單的清單、 固定大小清單。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼是針對較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 是否唯讀。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 是唯讀，則為 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀的集合不允許在集合建立後增加、移除或修改項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範實作<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面來建立簡單的清單、 固定大小清單。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼是針對較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 要取得或設定之以零為起始的項目索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的索引位置上取得或設定項目。

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 在指定索引上的項目。

trans-unit.source: This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以使用下列語法提供存取集合中特定元素的能力：`myCollection[index]`。

trans-unit.source: The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the <xref:System.Collections.IList.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: C# 語言使用關鍵字來定義索引，而不必實作<xref:System.Collections.IList.Item%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic implements <xref:System.Collections.IList.Item%2A> as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 會將 <xref:System.Collections.IList.Item%2A> 實作為預設屬性，這樣會提供相同的索引功能。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範實作<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面來建立簡單的清單、 固定大小清單。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼是針對較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is not a valid index in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 中的有效索引。

trans-unit.source: The property is set and the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 屬性已設定，而且 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The object to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />.
trans-unit.target: 要從 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 移除的物件。

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of a specific object from the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 移除特定物件之第一個符合的元素。

trans-unit.source: In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot.
trans-unit.target: 在相鄰元素的集合中，例如清單，接在移除的元素之後的元素會向上移動以佔用空出的位置。

trans-unit.source: If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合具有索引，則移動之項目的索引也會更新。

trans-unit.source: This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 集合的項目若在概念上群組成 Bucket (例如雜湊資料表)，則不適用這項行為。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is not found in the <xref:System.Collections.IList>, the <xref:System.Collections.IList> remains unchanged and no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 `value` 中找不到 <xref:System.Collections.IList>，<xref:System.Collections.IList> 會保持不變，而且不會值回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範實作<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面來建立簡單的清單、 固定大小清單。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼是針對較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 具有固定的大小。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is not in the list, the <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Remove(System.Object)" /> method should do nothing.
trans-unit.target: 如果<paramref name="value" />不在清單中，<see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Remove(System.Object)" />方法應該執行任何動作。

trans-unit.source: In particular, it should not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 特別是，它應該擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除之項目的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> item at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 移除在指定索引處的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot.
trans-unit.target: 在相鄰元素的集合中，例如清單，接在移除的元素之後的元素會向上移動以佔用空出的位置。

trans-unit.source: If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合具有索引，則移動之項目的索引也會更新。

trans-unit.source: This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 集合的項目若在概念上群組成 Bucket (例如雜湊資料表)，則不適用這項行為。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範實作<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面來建立簡單的清單、 固定大小清單。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼是針對較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is not a valid index in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 中的有效索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 具有固定的大小。
